::Savanna::

She ran along in the open plains.  Her and her pride were hunting.  
The brought down a large zebra.  She started to feast with the other 
lionesses.  After they had eaten most of the animal, they dragged it 
to where the cubs were resting.  She watched the cubs eat and play 
under the shade of an akasha tree.  She layed down on her side and 
one of the cubs came over to her and started biting her ear.  She 
batted at the cub playfully.  She was happy in her new home.  She 
hadn't transformed into her robot mode for a long time.  She alomst 
forgot that she could transform.  She had been with this pride for so 
long.  She hoped that things would never change.  She was a good 
hunter.  A good fighter, and looked out for her pride.  But somehow, 
she felt that something was missing.  Like she had something to do, 
but couldn't remember.  
She shrugger her shoulders and put the thought out of her mind.  She 
was happy where she was.  
The cub started batting and pouncing on her tail.  She chuckled to 
herself. Kids, got to love them, she thought.
